returns.parentContract: The contract address of the parent token (address(0) if no parent)
returns.parentTokenId: The token ID of the parent (0 if no parent)

rootOwnerOf(uint256).details: Get the root owner of a token by traversing parent relationships

returns.rootOwner: The address of the ultimate owner

transferAsChild(address,uint256,address,.details: Transfer token from one parent to another parent

params.fromContract: The contract address of the current parent
params.fromTokenId: The token ID of the current parent
params.toContract: The contract address of the new parent
params.toTokenId: The token ID of the new parent

transferFromParent(address,uint256,addre.details: Transfer token from parent to address

params.fromContract: The contract address of the parent token
params.fromTokenId: The token ID of the parent
params.to: The address to receive the token

transferToParent(address,address,uint256.details: Transfer token to a parent token

params.toContract: The contract address of the parent token
params.toTokenId: The token ID of the parent
